summary: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Masato Hagiwara|Tsuyoshi Ujiki|Anna Nakagawa|Yoriko Dôguchi|Yukijirô Hotaru|Denden|Ren Osugi|Masahiro Toda|Misayo Haruki|Shun Nakayama|Akira Ôtaka|Shôgo Suzuki|Toshi Kato|Hajime Tanimoto|Tsuyoshi Mikami|Makoto Kakeda|Yasujiro Tamura|Yasuharu Sato|Shinichiro Inoue|Yuri Shimada|Kae Egawa|Mitsuyo Suwa|Tetsushi Tanaka|Kazutaka Arayama|Emiko Hattori|Setchin Kawaya|Takayuki Konishi|Kae Minami|Tarô Suwa|Hiromi Suzuki|Makoto Togashi|Masato Yamaji|Yuu Yamazaki
title: Cure
